description:
Since YouTube was created in 2005, online videos have been a huge part of marketing campaigns. Videos convey information in a much more interesting and fun way than script ever could. And when information is interesting and fun, people share it! Your video will be all over Facebook, Twitter, and other Social Media Networks. By creating an animated promo video, you are engaging your audience. An animated promo video offers entertainment in addition to a sales pitch.


Previously, you would have to hire someone to create an animated video for you. It would be a costly and lengthly process. These days, GoAnimate is available! This program levels the playing field, and enables every business owner to participate in the content marketing exchange.

In this course, I am going to show you the ins and outs of GoAnimate! You will be able to:

- Create a storyboard
- Customize characters
- Add scenes
- Animate your characters
- Use generated or custom voice overs
- Feature music
- Change the composition
- Add transitions
- Use special FX
- Upload your own backgrounds and logo to be featured in the video

To cap it off, I am going to show you how to create an animated promo video from start to finish.

I look forward to seeing you in the course!
title: Learn How to Create an Animated Promo Video in 1 Hour
